text: The Cheitharol Kumbaba, originally spelt as the Cheithalol Kumpapa, is the royal court chronicle of the rulers of the Ningthouja dynasty of Manipur. It records various historical events happened in different reigns of the succeeding rulers right from the reign of Nongta Lailen Pakhangpa in 33 AD. ==Bibliography== * * ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:History of Manipur Category:Puya
title: Cheitharol Kumbaba
